column2: If you do not wish to receive them, you have the option to deactivate your account.
If you are a member of an Online Service, you may use that services account and privacy settings to personalize the collection, use and/or display of your data via that service.
To delete your Rockstar Games account, sign into your Social Club account, go to https://socialclub.rockstargames.com/profile equestdeleteaccount.html, and follow the instructions on the page.
